abstract: These celebrities aren't just pretty faces... they've got miraculous midsections as well!
description: These celebrities aren't just pretty faces... they've got miraculous midsections as well!
tags: julianne hough, izabel goulart, britney spears, scott eastwood, charlotte mckinney, blac chyna
body: These celebrities aren't just pretty faces... they've got miraculous midsections as well!
mobileTitle: Abs-olutely hot! Stomachs of the stars
title: Abs-olutely hot! Stomachs of the stars

images.alt: In case anyone forgot, Khloe Kardashian is here to remind the world that she works out. The reality star took to her Instagram stories on September 5, 2017 to show off her rock hard abs, which she wasn't shy about showing off in a huge bathroom mirror, and her overall workout-toned body.
images.caption: In case anyone forgot, Khloe Kardashian is here to remind the world that she works out. The reality star took to her Instagram stories on September 5, 2017 to show off her rock hard abs, which she wasn't shy about showing off in a huge bathroom mirror, and her overall workout-toned body.

images.alt: You've got to take your hat off to Bella Thorne and her incredible abs. Wearing a red bikini top, the actress apparently forgot to button her shirt but didn't forget top off her look with a red hat while out and about in Los Angeles on Aug. 29, 2017.
images.caption: You've got to take your hat off to Bella Thorne and her incredible abs. Wearing a red bikini top, the actress apparently forgot to button her shirt but didn't forget top off her look with a red hat while out and about in Los Angeles on Aug. 29, 2017.

images.alt: Another day, another gym workout for Britney Spears. Just hours after she shared a video of herself performing an exercise routine, the 35-year-old took a selfie revealing her jaw-dropping washboard abs in the gym. "Staying focused" she captioned the photo on Aug. 24, 2017.
images.caption: Another day, another gym workout for Britney Spears. Just hours after she shared a video of herself performing an exercise routine, the 35-year-old took a selfie revealing her jaw-dropping washboard abs in the gym. "Staying focused" she captioned the photo on Aug. 24, 2017.

images.alt: A shirtless and heavily tattooed Cameron Douglas is seen jogging alongside Manhattan's Hudson River Park.  Some of the tattoos on his body consist of the faces of his father Michael Douglas and Grandfather Kirk Douglas. It was also recently announced that his girlfriend is pregnant with their first child.
images.caption: A shirtless and heavily tattooed Cameron Douglas is seen jogging alongside Manhattan's Hudson River Park.  Some of the tattoos on his body consist of the faces of his father Michael Douglas and Grandfather Kirk Douglas. It was also recently announced that his girlfriend is pregnant with their first child.

images.alt: "Good Morning America" anchor Lara Spencer gave her fans a wakeup call when she shared a photo of her jaw-dropping six-pack in a swimsuit during her vacation in Nantucket. The 48-year-old was all smiles as she held onto a drink in the photo, captioned "ACK TIME," on Aug. 10, 2017.
images.caption: "Good Morning America" anchor Lara Spencer gave her fans a wakeup call when she shared a photo of her jaw-dropping six-pack in a swimsuit during her vacation in Nantucket. The 48-year-old was all smiles as she held onto a drink in the photo, captioned "ACK TIME," on Aug. 10, 2017.

images.alt: Bella Thorne is convinced she needs to get back into shape, but her fans (and anyone who can see) will strongly disagree. The 'Famous in Love' star posted this fit and fab photo showing off her insanely toned stomach to Instagram on August 9, 2017 with the caption "Trying to get back in shapeeeee leggo." If she hasn't been following the 'no days off' rule, it clearly doesn't show.
images.caption: Bella Thorne is convinced she needs to get back into shape, but her fans (and anyone who can see) will strongly disagree. images.alt: Is it obvious Bella Thorne loves being at the gym? The 'Famous in Love' actress proudly showed off her toned stomach, earned after many gym trips she's documented on social media, while on the set of her music video for 'Just Call,' her collaboration with DJ and producer Prince Fox, on July 27, 2017. "Oh hi. #justcall #musicvideo," she greeted fans from behind white shades; she also looked positively pink in a pair of pink satin shorts and a matching bra.

images.alt: Blac Chyna showed off her incredible post baby body, just weeks after ex-Rob Kardashian claimed she had plastic surgery, which came with a $100k price tag. The 29-year-old mother-of-two wore a crop top and short shorts that revealed her tiny waist and curves for a night out at Couture nightclub in Hollywood. Chyna made sure she made a grand exit as she took off in a white and red Ferrari Spider.
images.caption: Blac Chyna showed off her incredible post baby body, just weeks after ex-Rob Kardashian claimed she had plastic surgery, which came with a $100k price tag. Chyna made sure she made a grand exit as she took off in a white and red Ferrari Spider.

images.alt: Blac Chyna put her drama with ex Rob Kardashian on hold for a night out at strip club Ace Of Diamonds LA in West Hollywood. The 29-year-old reality star revealed her tiny waist in a sparkly crop top and mini skirt to host an event at the club on July 17, 2017.

The actress and 'Dancing with the Stars' alum showed off her gym-toned abs while out in Studio City, California for some coffee on June 27, 2017, showing onlookers that "If you got it, flaunt it" is clearly her life's motto.

images.alt: With a body like that, who can blame Britney Spears for taking to social media to flaunt her washboard abs? "Happy Monday everyone!" the 34-year-old captioned this selfie, donning a peach crop top that revealed her rock hard abs while on vacation in Hawaii on April 4, 2016.

images.alt: Kate Hudson shows off her abs in Fabletics bra and shorts combo.
images.caption: Her clothing line may be under fire, but that didn't stop Kate Hudson from showing off her taut tummy in a red bra and boy short combo from her Fabletics line. This little bra and boys hort with little tiny hearts all over it @fabletics #SneakPeek #ValentinesDay2016 #fabletics," Hudson captioned the selfie on Oct. 8, 2015. Customers of the athletic company fronted by Hudson have accused the firm if signing them up for a monthly subscription that is difficult to cancel.

images.alt: Kylie Jenner loves her body and she's not afraid to show it off! The 18-year-old reality star took to Instagram to display her toned tummy in workout clothes while lounging around her new Los Angeles home with friends. "Chill night," Jenner captioned the photo from Sept. 7, 2015.

images.alt: Footballer Cristiano Ronaldo strips down as he promotes his new collection of CR7 underwear.
images.caption: Soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo striped down to promote his new collection of CR7 underwear. The Real Madrid and Portugal soccer ace showed off his amazing abs in the sexy new campaign images. "The new campaign is all about body movement. The product features the lightest and most comfortable materials and has a great fit, no matter how your body moves, so we really wanted to bring this to life," Ronaldo said about the new collection.

images.caption: Looks like all that acting sure pays off! "Game of Thrones" actress Nathalie Emmanuel showed off her impressive bikini body in a tiny black bathing suit while vacationing in Ischia, Italy on July 15, 2015.

images.alt: Kaley Cuoco shows off her abs after a yoga class.
images.caption: Kaley Cuoco makes sweat sexy! The glistening actress showed off her amazing abs while leaving a yoga class on a hot day in Los Angles. The "Big Bang" star rolled up her black workout top to give a glimpse of her fit physique before hiding her face with a towel on July 20, 2015.

images.alt: Gigi Hadid shows off her toned abs in New York.
images.caption: It's hot in New York, but Gigi Hadid knows how to stay cool! The 20-year-old blond model flaunted her toned tummy in a stylish crop top as she hit the streets of Manhattan with new beau Joe Jonas (not pictured) on July 10, 2015.

images.alt: Candice Swanepoel shows off her abs after a workout in New York City.
images.caption: She didn't become a Victoria's Secret Angles without lots of hard work! Candice Swanepoel was spotted flaunted her fantastic abs after a workout session in New York City on July 8, 2015. The sexy blond rocked skin-tight spandex pants and a black sports bra that showed off her supermodel physique, as she toted a yoga mat under her arm.

images.alt: Khloe Kardashian posted a picture of herself licking Kendall Jenner's stomach.
images.caption: Abs-olutely delicious? Most people lift weights or run on the treadmill at the gym, but Khloe Kardashian would rather lick her supermodel sister's stomach! "I missed her so much and those abs were irresistible!!!! #SisterSister," Khloe captioned the quirky snap of herself licking Kendall Jenner's toned stomach on July 8, 2015.

images.alt: Drake posted a workout pic to Instagram on July 7, 2015.
images.caption: That's what you’d call washboard abs! All of Drake's hard work in the gym is paying off and he's certainly not shy about doing a little humble bragging. "@ipushpounds early morning," he captioned this sexy Instagram showing off his amazing physique and crediting his trainer on July 7, 2015.

images.alt: Kendall Jenner seen on rueCambon on the way to Chanel during Haute Couture Fall 2015 in Paris.
images.caption: Kendall Jenner turned the Paris sidewalk into her own personal catwalk as she flaunted her amazing abs on the way to do some shopping at Chanel on July 6, 2015. The blossoming supermodel is in the City of Lights for Paris Haute Couture Fashion Week 2015.

images.alt: Sienna Miller on the beach in spain
images.caption: With her busy work schedule, it's hard to imagine when Sienna Miller finds time to maintain her physique! The "American Sniper" actress showed off her impressive bikini body while on vacation in Formentera, Spain with her partner on July 3, 2015.

images.alt: Kylie Jenner and Khloe Kardashian posts selfie.
images.caption: Looks like there's a new kid on the block! Kylie Jenner got some assistance from big sis Khloe as she moved into her $2.7 million mansion on June 29, 2015. "don't you wish your move in crew looked like mine" the 17-year-old captioned her selfie with the two of them donning identical crop tops that showed off their toned abs.

images.alt: Jennifer Lawrence shows off her taut tummy in crop top.
images.caption: Who says black has to be boring? Jennifer Lawrence flashed her taut tummy in a crop top and matching high-waisted skirt by Michael Kors as she stepped out in New York City amid rumors the "Hunger Games" star is house hunting in the Big Apple.

images.alt: Kaley Cuoco posted an Instagram in a bikini on June 24, 2015. "Yep. Leave it to me to find a swim-suit pant"
images.caption: Kaley Cuoco flaunted her amazing abs in in a tiny bikini top and spandex shorts as she posed poolside for an Instagram snap on June 24, 2015. "Yep. Leave it to me to find a swim-suit pant," she captioned the photo that showed off her terrifically toned physique.

images.alt: Kourtney Kardashian posts selfie of her abs on Instagram.
images.caption: How AB-out those abs! Kourtney Kardashian gave birth to her third child back in December -- so can you blame the 36-year-old for proudly showing off her toned tummy? "Hopped up out the bed, turn my swag on Took a look in the mirror said what's up?" the "Keeping Up With the Kardashians" star captioned her selfie from the closet on June 18, 2015.

images.alt: Zach Efron showed off his body in Oahu, Hawaii.
images.caption: Aloha! Zach Efron showed off his ripped muscles while hanging out by a lake shirtless with "Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates" co-stars Adam DeVine and Aubrey Plaza. The 27-year-old Hollywood hunk appeared to be having a great time as he was seen swinging on a rope before leaping into the lake on June 14, 2015.

images.alt: Cristiano Ronaldo shows off his rock hard bod on a yacht in St. Tropez.
images.caption: Trying to make Irina Shayk jealous? Cristiano Ronaldo flaunted his perfectly toned build as he soaked up the sun on a yacht in St. Tropez on May 31, 2015. The soccer star was spotted hanging out with friends as he rocked a tiny yellow bathing suit that showed off his athletic build.

images.alt: Britney Spears shares photo of abs while hiking
images.caption: She worked very hard to get her post-baby body back and she's not afraid to show it off! Singer and actress Britney Spears revealed her set of very impressive abs while enjoying a day of hiking. "You never know what caution you're gonna get in the wild," the 33-year-old mom of two captioned the Instagram post on June 12, 2015.

images.alt: Jennifer Lopez shows off her incredible abs in crop top at LAX airport.
images.caption: J Lo may have been "glitter-bombed" by a clown at LAX airport, but it was the Diva who was having the last laugh! The 45-year-old showed off her incredible stomach in a crop-top and low-rise jeans as she caught a flight out of Los Angeles on May 26, 2015.

images.alt: Shirtless Matt Bomer and his husband Simon Halls spotted vacationing together in Hawaii.
images.caption: Ab-solutely smokin'! Matt Bomer showed off his killer core while walking on the beach in Hawaii on May 20, 2015. The "Magic Mike" star soaked up the sun while vacationing with his husband Simon Halls.

images.alt: -AUS,-CHN,-CZE,-DNK,-EST,-FIN,-FRA,-ITA,-JPN,-NLD,-NZL,-POL,-SWE,-TUR,-xdmail,-GLMRUS,-SPNMag,-JcyXXL,-xdmwkd,-SPNcom,-JJ,-YHOINC,-Popcom,-YAHOO,-SPNMGI,-YHOOUK,-EbnyMg,-XBSP,-THYBF,-XSRO,-XMAILO,-JJdwn,-XGYB,-YHOThr,-PopExc,-YHOESP,-XGLG,-PopUK,-JJJr,-IRE
images.caption: When you have a body like Kate Hudson's, who better to model your athletic wear line than yourself! The 36-year-old mother-of-two was spotted baring her awesome abs in a rolled up tank top while posing for a photo shoot for Fabletics on April 28, 2015 in Los Angeles.

images.alt: Miley Cyrus heads to her morning workout amidst break-up rumors.
images.caption: She may be surrounded by a whirlwind of breakup rumors, but Miley looked unfazed as she was spotted flaunting her fabulous abs in a sports bra and spandex leggings. The "Wrecking Ball" hitmaker waved to the cameras while heading to her workout in Studio City on April 22, 2015.

images.alt: Candice Swanepoel
images.caption: Who wouldn't show off their abs with a body like that! Victoria's Secret model Candice Swanepoel oiled up her washboard abs to work on her tan on March 27, 2015.

images.alt: Eddie Murphy's girlfriend Paige Butcher shows off her incredible body in a bikini in Hawaii.
images.caption: Funnyman Eddie Murphy certainly has something to smile about! While the comedian's womanizing ways is no secret, his girlfriend Paige Butcher revealed how she keeps Murphy on his toes by showing off her incredibly svelte bikini body while enjoying a day at the beach in Maui, Hawaii on March 25, 2015.

images.alt: David Beckham shows off his abs while shirtless in Miami.
images.caption: David Beckham may have retired from soccer, but the 39-year-old proved he's still in tip-top shape as she showed off her bulging abs while soaking up the sun in Miami. Beck's appeared to be admiring the view (while we enjoyed ours) from his balcony on March 24, 2015.

images.alt: An Instagram photo of Karlie Kloss showing off her abs while working out during Paris Fashion Week.
images.caption: You know you've got great abs when you can steal the attention away from the amazing Notre Dame cathedral! Karlie Kloss took to Instagram to share a snap of her workout regimen during Paris Fashion Week -- and to show off her fit physique! "Running from the Hunchback #FitnessFriday #PFW," she captioned the photo on March 6, 2015.

images.alt: Khloe Kardashian shows off her abs in Instagram shot.
images.caption: Hard work does pay off! Khloe Kardashian proudly showed off her rock-solid abs in her latest Instagram post with a heartfelt note about her transformation. "My fitness journey will be a life long journey. Fitness is not about being better than someone else… It's about being better than you used to be. I'm not where I want to be and who knows if I ever will be. But I am healthier than ever and due to my consistent workouts, I am slowly seeing results. Hi baby abs!! I see you!!!" she captioned the snap on Feb. 27, 2015.

images.alt: Mark Wahlberg and Rhea Durham show off their abs in Barbados.
images.caption: And the award for couple with the best abs goes to Mark Wahlberg and his wife Rhea Durham! The husband and wife duo enjoyed some quality time with their children on the beach in Barbados on Dec. 26, 2014. The hulking actor showed off his chiseled physique as his wife flaunted her fit figure in a teeny bikini. The couple was even spotted sneaking a few kisses as they watched their children play in the ocean.

images.alt: Suki Waterhouse shows off incredible
images.caption: Is that what you call model behavior, Suki Waterhouse? The supermodel, who is also dating Bradley Cooper, showed off her incredibly toned stomach in a cropped cardigan while running wild in Chelsea, London. The 22-year-old was in high spirits, pulling a series of funny faces while running down the street with Cara Delevingne and Georgia May Jagger on April 26, 2014.

images.alt: Doutzen Kroes posted a picture to Instagram showing off her abs.
images.caption: So that’s how she stays in shape! Supermodel Doutzen Kroes gave her Instagram followers a sneak peek of how she gets fit for the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show with a snap she captioned, "Working with @balletbeautiful today! Getting in the mood for the #VSFashionShow." The model held a ballet pose while showing off her killer abs in the photo from Nov. 9, 2014.

images.alt: Joe Manganiello shows off his abs on the beach while filming "Magic Mike XXL."
images.caption: Magic Mike? More like Magic Manganiello! Sofia Vergara's hunky boyfriend Joe Manganiello took a break from filming his upcoming movie, "Magic Mike XXL" to play some football with co-stars Matt Bomer and Adam Rodriguez (not pictured). The sexy actor ditched his shirt and put his phenomenal physique on display while having some fun on Tybee Island in Georgia on Oct. 9, 2014.

images.alt: Scott Eastwood posts a picture to Instagram.
images.caption: Have you ever seen a merman with such killer abs? "Nothing to see here. Just another merman on the beach," Scott Eastwood posted to his Instagram account on July 2, 2014.

images.alt: Tim McGraw shows off his abs for Men's Health.
images.caption: Tim McGraw is ripped! The country star is showing off his rock-solid physique in the July/August issue of Men's Health, and we think it's safe to say the singer has never looked better. Pairing his minimal workout gear with plenty of attitude, the 47-year-old gives fans a sneak peek at his fitness regimen in the latest issue, due out June 24.

images.alt: Vanessa Hudgens shows off her abs.
images.caption: Summer is around the corner and Vanessa Hudgens knows it! The Hollywood beauty showed off the fruits off her labor (check out those rock hard abs!) while hiking in the L.A. hills. Donning a skimpy crop top and skin-tight leggings, the star had no problem stopping traffic as she skipped across the road on June 10, 2014.

images.alt: Vanessa Hudgens shows off her abs in Los Angeles.
images.caption: Vanessa Hudgens showed off her toned abs while hiking in the canyons of Los Angeles on June 5, 2014. The star wore a black sports bra and a leopard print jacket tied around her waist.

images.alt: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro shows off his rock-hard abs on Instagram.
images.caption: If there's one thing this "Jersey Shore" star is serious about, it's gym time. Ronnie Ortiz-Magro took to Instagram to show off his incredible body transformation after just four weeks of diet and exercise: "I really let myself go after I got sick last year," he posted, referring to when he was hospitalized in 2013 for kidney stones. "It's been a long road. I am nowhere I want to be shape wise, but I feel better than I ever did."

images.alt: Zachary Quinto shows off his abs on Instagram.
images.caption: Taking mirror selfies of his incredibly ripped abs is all part of a day's work for Zachary Quinto. The actor, who is set to star in action flick "Agent 47," posted this hot shot of his super toned stomach on Instagram: "back to work(ing out). agent 47. home stretch" he wrote.

images.alt: Michelle Lewin shows off her rock hard abs.
images.caption: Venezuelan fitness model Michelle Lewin certainly worked up a sweat (and so did the paparazzi) while she worked out in Miami to the delight of spectators. The bombshell revealed her rock hard abs on April 1, 2014.

images.alt: Kelly Bensimon shows off bikini body in Naples.
images.caption: The only thing wilder than Kelly Bensimon's leopard print bikini? Her insane abs! The former "Real Housewives of New York" star stole the show as she and her taut tummy made waves in Naples during the Easter holiday weekend.

images.alt: Serena Williams shows off her bikini body in Miami.
images.caption: Serena Williams displayed not only her killer abs, but her impressive curves when she hit the beach in Miami. The tennis star showed off the fruits of her (gym) labor in a teeny tiny bikini on April 16, 2014.

images.alt: Bella Thorne on the cover of Seventeen magazine.
images.caption: Bella Thorne is all ready for summer. The "Blended" star graces the cover of Seventeen magazine's June/July issue, showing off her incredible abs in beach-ready looks perfect for a day in the sun. The confident star opened up to the magazine about struggles girls face with body image: "Girls are shamed for their bodies and made to believe that they're not supposed to show them or love them," she tells the mag. "They're made to believe that they aren't perfect, that they need to ‘work on it,' that they need to see themselves differently -- and I think it's freaking ridiculous." The issue hit newsstands May 20.

images.alt: Andy Cohen show off beach body in Miami.
images.caption: Bravo, Andy Cohen! The "Watch What Happens Live" late night host certainly gave us something to talk about as he took a dip in the ocean while in Miami on April 4, 2014. Who knew he was packing so much muscle?

images.alt: Rita Ora shows off abs in crop top.
images.caption: Rita Ora is known for putting on a great show when she hits the stage but the singer put on an even better one when she was spotted in a crop top after wrapping up another workout. The pop star showed off her abs in West Hollywood on March 18, 2014.

images.alt: Alexander Skarsgard in the South Pole.
images.caption: Never mind the fact he's hanging out in his underwear in the freezing South Pole -- "True Blood" star Alexander Skarsgard is still scorching hot. Donning a faux yellow beard and not much else, the actor celebrated his 200 km charity trek to the South Pole by flashing his sculpted abs during one very chilly photo op.

images.alt: Kelly Bensimon flaunts abs in white bikini in Miami
images.caption: Kelly Bensimon made abs-olutely sure all eyes were on her as she flaunted her abs in a white bikini on Miami Beach. The reality TV star certainly works hard to keep in shape, but the question is, has she gone too far? The 45-year-old showed off her chiseled abs and muscular arms, putting her male friend to shame on Dec. 8, 2013.

images.alt: Vinny Guadagnino on Instagram: "#transformationtuesday ... 3 week cleanse!
images.caption: Move over Snooki -- you aren't the only "Jersey Shore" star to drop some major lbs. The self-proclaimed meatball's co-star Vinny Guadagnino took to Twitter to unveil his new, rock-hard abs by sharing this striking before-and-after shot, which he posted to Instagram on Nov. 5, 2013. "#transformationtuesday ... 3 week cleanse!" he posted. It looks like all that time at the gym is certainly paying off.

images.alt: Kate Hudson in the November 2013 issue of SHAPE.
images.caption: Kate Hudson looks slim and trim in the November issue of Shape magazine. The 34-year-old actress credits dancing, Pilates and occasional cleanses for whipping her into shape, but she still loves to chow down. "I just love food," she says. "I love bread, I love pasta."

images.alt: A shirtless Tim Tebow hangs out on the beach and goes surfing while vacationing on Hawaii.
images.caption: The future of Tim Tebow's football career may be up in the air but one thing is certain -- the athlete has definitely been using any downtime he may have to keep his abs in tip-top shape. The quarterback appeared laidback and care-free as he flaunted his muscles during a day at the beach in Hawaii on Oct. 14, 2013.

images.alt: Scott Eastwood posted a picture of himself shirtless on the set of Fury, his new movie with Brad Pitt and Shia LaBeouf.
images.caption: What a tank! Scott Eastwood challenged this army tank to a showdown. "Trying to out flex the tank," he captioned the photo. "Not working." The upcoming star showed off his ripped physique on Instagram, posing on the set of "Fury," his new movie with Hollywood’s finest, Brad Pitt and Shia LaBeouf. Going shirtless is becoming quite the habit for the 27-year-old -- the dashing son of Clint Eastwood recently took his shirt off for the cover of Town and County magazine, appearing to be his father's double back in the day.

images.alt: Usher in the November 2013  issue of Mens Health.
images.caption: Usher is ripped and he wants you to know it! The singer posed shirtless for the November 2013 issue of Men's Health. The multitalented entertainer will hit the big screen as Sugar Ray Leonard in the 2014 film "Hands of Stone." "My commitment to this character demands that I not only physically get ready, but also become him," the singer said in an interview with the magazine. "I train like an athlete every day, believe it or not," he said. Check out more amazing abs ...

images.alt: These abs are so hot, they should be illegal! Shemar Moore from "Criminal Minds" showed us he's ready to fight crime with these bulging guns. The 43-year-old actor's hot body was definitely in need of a cool-down -- the Emmy award winning star took dip on
images.caption: These abs are so hot, they should be illegal! Shemar Moore from "Criminal Minds" showed us he's ready to fight crime with these bulging guns. The 43-year-old actor's hot body was definitely in need of a cool-down -- the star took a dip on Miami Beach on Labor Day.

images.alt: David Beckham takes his sons Brooklyn, Romeo and Cruz to hit the surf and sand in Los Angeles. Beckham hopped on a boogie board to catch a few waves and then grabbed his camera to snap some photos of his boys catching some waves.
images.caption: David Beckham shirtless on the beach? Score! The former soccer player's flawless physique certainly made waves as he enjoyed a sizzling day at the beach in Los Angeles surfing with his sons Romeo and Cruz on Aug. 29, 2013.

images.alt: 'I never do this but... Healthy living and fitness update. Post workout picture. #diabeticinshape #2.0'  Nick Jonas posts a shirtless Instagram photo on July 30, 2013.
images.caption: Need some motivation to go to the gym? Look no further than Nick Jonas. The famous JoBro took to Instagram to proudly flaunt the results of long hard hours spent getting into shape. "I never do this but... Healthy living and fitness update. Post workout picture. #diabeticinshape #2.0" he posted.

images.alt: Justin Bieber shows off his stomach on Instagram on July 1, 2013. @JustinBieber via Instagram
images.caption: Whether he's on stage or off, Justin Bieber is always putting on a show. The 19-year-old singer flashed his abs -- much to the delight of Beliebers everywhere -- in an Instagram shot posted on July 1, 2013.

images.alt: Chris Pratt posted a picture on Instagram on July 6, 2013.
images.caption: Chris Pratt has bulked up for his new role! The 34-year-old actor is set to star as superhero Star-Lord (Peter Quill) in the upcoming sci-fi flick "Guardians of the Galaxy," and he showed off his slimmed down bod on Instagram on July 6, 2013 (l.). "Six months no beer. #GOTG,” the new dad wrote.

images.alt: Television personalities Valentin Chmerkovskiy (R) and Maksim Chmerkovskiy arrive at the Liquid Pool Lounge at the Aria Resort & Casino at CityCenter on June 27, 2013 in Las Vegas, Nevada.
images.caption: Having rock-hard abs must run in the family. Brothers Maksim and Val Chmerkovskiy of "Dancing with the Stars" fame had their identical washboard stomachs out front and center as they showed off in matching black swim trunks at the Aria Resort & Casino in Las Vegas on June 27, 2013.

images.alt: Gwen Stefani shows off her toned midriff while enjoying the sunny Los Angeles weather in Long Beach, California with her family on June 29, 2013.
images.caption: She may be 43 years old, but Gwen Stefani still has some of the best abs in the business! The "No Doubt" singer showed off her incredibly toned midriff in a white crop top and low rise jeans while spending the day with her two sons in Long Beach, Calif. on  June 29, 2013.

images.alt: Jan. 27, 2013: irinashaykofficial via Instagram @eli_miz that's how we roll Sunday nite# soulcycle class
images.caption: Irina Shayk's toned stomach doesn't just happen overnight. The supermodel posted this Instagram picture after an intense workout on Jan. 27, 2013. "that's how we roll Sunday nite# soulcycle class," she wrote.

images.alt: Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi  shows off her abs on Instagram.
images.caption: Snooki has gone from the Jersey Shore to the gym! The former self-proclaimed "meatball" took to Instagram to flaunt the results of all her hard work. "Getting more toned & defined !! #muscles #fitlife" she posted, sharing a photo of herself in a belly-baring outfit that showed off her svelte new figure. The pint-sized mama has dropped more than 40 pounds since giving birth to baby Lorenzo Dominic in August 2012.

images.alt: True Blood star Joe Manganiello in the July 2013 issue of Mens Health UK.
images.caption: Ladies, you're welcome! "Magic Mike" actor, Joe Manganiello, flaunted his fit body in the July 2013 issue of "Men's Health." But this is hardly the only time he's showed off his impossibly toned body ...

images.alt: "Good Morning America" host Lara Spencer shared a photo of herself in a bikini revealing her jaw-dropping six-pack while on vacation in Nantucket on Aug. 10, 2017. "ACK TIME." she captioned the photo.
images.caption: "Good Morning America" host Lara Spencer shared a photo of herself in a bikini revealing her jaw-dropping six-pack while on vacation in Nantucket on Aug. 10, 2017. "ACK TIME." she captioned the photo.
